title: Customer Registration with Mobile Number and OTP Verification
description: As a new user, I want to register for an account using my Indian mobile number and an OTP, so that I can securely create my user profile and begin browsing vendors and placing orders.
sprint_goal: Establish Foundational Infrastructure and User Onboarding
acceptance_criteria: Successful registration with new mobile number and OTP; Error on existing number; PII data consent captured.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
deployment_notes: Deploys to Identity & Access service.
business_value: Enables new user acquisition, a critical step for platform growth.

title: Customer Registration Error for Existing Number
description: As a prospective customer, I want to be shown an error message when I use a mobile number that is already in the system, so that I understand I already have an account and can log in instead.
sprint_goal: Establish Foundational Infrastructure and User Onboarding
acceptance_criteria: System displays a specific error for a duplicate number; User is provided a direct path to the login screen.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
deployment_notes: Deploys to Identity & Access service.
business_value: Prevents duplicate accounts and improves user onboarding experience.

title: Admin Views Pending Vendor and Rider Registrations
description: As an Administrator, I want to view a clear, filterable, and sortable list of all pending vendor and rider registration applications, so that I can efficiently manage the queue of new applicants.
sprint_goal: Establish Foundational Infrastructure and User Onboarding
acceptance_criteria: A paginated table of pending registrations is displayed; Admin can filter by user type (Vendor/Rider).
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
collaboration_required: Frontend team for admin dashboard UI
deployment_notes: Deploys to Identity & Access service and Admin Dashboard.
business_value: Enables the vendor and rider onboarding workflow.

title: Admin Reviews Registration Details and Documents
description: As an Administrator, I want to review all submitted details and uploaded documents for a specific pending registration, so that I can accurately verify the applicant's credentials.
sprint_goal: Establish Foundational Infrastructure and User Onboarding
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view all submitted details for Vendor and Rider; Admin can view/download uploaded documents via secure, pre-signed URLs.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met for document access.
deployment_notes: Requires S3 bucket for documents to be configured.
business_value: Ensures platform integrity and safety by thoroughly vetting all partners.

title: Admin Approves a Vendor or Rider Registration
description: As an Administrator, I want to approve a verified vendor or rider registration with a single action, so that I can efficiently onboard them to the platform and grant them operational access.
sprint_goal: Establish Foundational Infrastructure and User Onboarding
acceptance_criteria: Admin can approve a pending registration; User's status changes to 'active'; Notification is sent; Action is logged in audit trail.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
deployment_notes: Deploys to Identity & Access service.
business_value: Enables growth of the vendor/rider network, a core business function.

title: Admin Rejects a Vendor or Rider Registration with a Reason
description: As an Administrator, I want to reject a pending vendor or rider registration and provide a specific reason, so that I can maintain platform quality and inform the applicant.
sprint_goal: Establish Foundational Infrastructure and User Onboarding
acceptance_criteria: Admin can reject a registration with a predefined or custom reason; User's status is updated to 'rejected'; Notification is sent; Action is logged.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
deployment_notes: Deploys to Identity & Access service.
business_value: Ensures platform integrity by onboarding only verified users.

title: Admin Views Searchable and Immutable Audit Trail
description: As an Administrator, I want to view a searchable and filterable audit trail of all significant actions performed within the admin system, so that I can ensure accountability and investigate security incidents.
sprint_goal: Establish Foundational Infrastructure and User Onboarding
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view audit trail; Can filter by date, actor, and action type; Audit trail is immutable from the UI.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met for immutability.
collaboration_required: All backend teams to integrate with audit service
deployment_notes: Requires a dedicated, append-only table in the database.
business_value: Enhances platform security, compliance, and accountability.

title: Admin Manages All Users via a Comprehensive Dashboard
description: As an Administrator, I want a comprehensive user management dashboard with robust search, filtering, and sorting capabilities, so that I can efficiently locate any user on the platform to monitor their status and perform necessary account management actions.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view a paginated list of all users; Admin can search by name; Admin can filter by role and status; Admin can sort the list.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; API performance meets NFRs.
deployment_notes: Requires database indexing for efficient searching and filtering.
business_value: Enables efficient platform administration and improves support response times.

title: Admin Suspends a User Account
description: As an Administrator, I want to suspend a user's account and record a reason, so that I can temporarily revoke their access for policy violations.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Admin can suspend a user with a reason; User's status is updated to 'Suspended'; User's active sessions are invalidated; Action is logged in audit trail.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
deployment_notes: Requires robust session invalidation mechanism.
business_value: Enables effective platform moderation and enhances security.

title: Admin Deactivates a User Account
description: As an Administrator, I want to deactivate a user's account through a secure, two-step confirmation process, so that I can permanently revoke their access to the platform.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Admin can deactivate a user via two-step confirmation; User's status is updated to 'deactivated'; Sessions are invalidated; Action is logged in audit trail.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
deployment_notes: Requires robust session invalidation mechanism.
business_value: Provides essential security and operational control.

title: Admin Confirms Critical Deletes with a Two-Step Verification Process
description: As an Administrator, I want to be presented with a two-step confirmation dialog that requires a deliberate action before executing a critical delete operation, so that I can prevent accidental data loss.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Admin is presented with a two-step confirmation for critical deletes (Users, Stores, Zones); Admin must type entity name to confirm; Cancelling the action aborts the deletion.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; UI/UX reviewed and approved.
collaboration_required: Backend team to define 'critical delete' APIs
deployment_notes: Implemented as a reusable frontend component.
business_value: Mitigates risk of accidental, irreversible data loss of core entities.

title: Customer Login with OTP
description: As a registered customer, I want to log in to my account using my mobile number and an OTP so that I can access my profile and place orders.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Successful login with valid mobile and OTP; Account lockout after 5 failed attempts; OTP generation is rate-limited.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security features (rate limiting, lockout) implemented and tested.
deployment_notes: Implements security features for authentication.
business_value: Provides secure and convenient access for users, a prerequisite for all platform engagement.

title: Customer Login Error for Invalid OTP
description: As a registered customer, I want to be shown a clear error message when I enter an incorrect OTP, so that I can quickly try again.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: User is shown 'Invalid OTP' for incorrect OTP; User is shown 'OTP has expired' for expired OTP; Input field is cleared for retry.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; UI/UX reviewed and approved.
collaboration_required: Backend team for API error codes
business_value: Improves user experience by providing clear, actionable feedback during a common error scenario.

title: Customer Account Lockout After Failed Attempts
description: As a customer, I want the system to temporarily lock my account after several consecutive failed OTP login attempts, to protect me from brute-force attacks.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Account is locked after 5 failed attempts; Login/OTP requests are blocked during lockout; Account is automatically unlocked after duration expires.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
deployment_notes: Requires Redis for state management.
business_value: Enhances platform security by preventing brute-force attacks.

title: Vendor Initiates Registration with Business Details and Documents
description: As a prospective local business owner, I want to fill out a registration form with my business details and upload necessary legal documents, so that I can submit my application to become a vendor.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Successful registration submission with all required info; Account status is 'pending_verification'; Error on existing mobile/GST number.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Secure file handling implemented and verified.
deployment_notes: Requires S3 bucket for documents.
business_value: Critical step in the vendor acquisition funnel.

title: Rider Initiates Registration with Document Upload
description: As a prospective delivery rider, I want to register for an account by providing my personal details, vehicle information, bank details, and uploading necessary documents.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Successful registration submission with all details and documents; Account status is 'pending_verification'; Error on existing mobile number.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Secure file handling implemented.
deployment_notes: Requires S3 bucket for documents.
business_value: Enables the onboarding of new riders, critical for delivery capacity.

title: Vendor Views Pending Verification Status
description: As a new vendor, I want to be shown a 'Pending Verification' status page when I log in, so that I have confirmation that my application is under review.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Successful login by a pending vendor redirects to a dedicated 'Pending Verification' page; User is blocked from accessing other dashboard URLs.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; UI/UX reviewed.
collaboration_required: Backend team for user status API
deployment_notes: Requires frontend route guards.
business_value: Improves vendor onboarding experience by providing immediate feedback.

title: Rider Views Pending Verification Status
description: As a new rider, I want to see a 'Pending Verification' status on my screen so that I know my application was received and is under review.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Successful login by a pending rider redirects to 'Pending Verification' screen; Rider is blocked from accessing other app sections.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; UI/UX reviewed.
collaboration_required: Backend team for user status API
deployment_notes: Requires mobile app route guards.
business_value: Improves rider onboarding experience by managing expectations.

title: Customer Profile Management
description: As a registered customer, I want to view and edit my personal profile information (name and email), so that my account details are accurate.
sprint_goal: Complete User Onboarding and Core Profile Management
acceptance_criteria: Customer can view their profile info; Customer can edit name and email; Mobile number is non-editable; A notification is sent on change.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; API performance meets NFRs.
business_value: Enhances user data accuracy and trust by giving users control.

title: Vendor Login with OTP
description: As a registered vendor, I want to log in to my dashboard using my mobile number and an OTP so that I can securely manage my store.
sprint_goal: Enable Vendor Self-Service and Catalog Management
acceptance_criteria: Successful login for active vendor; Login blocked for non-active vendor accounts.
definition_of_done: Code reused/refactored from customer login; E2E tests passing for all vendor statuses.
deployment_notes: Reuses core authentication logic.
business_value: Provides secure access for vendors to the platform's core management tools.

title: Rider Login with OTP
description: As a registered Rider, I want to log in to the mobile application using my registered mobile number and an OTP so that I can access my account.
sprint_goal: Enable Vendor Self-Service and Catalog Management
acceptance_criteria: Successful login for active rider; Login blocked for non-active rider accounts.
definition_of_done: Code reused/refactored from customer login; E2E tests passing for all rider statuses.
deployment_notes: Reuses core authentication logic.
business_value: Provides a secure, password-less authentication method for riders.

title: Vendor Manages Store Profile
description: As a registered vendor, I want to view and edit my store's profile information, including its name, address, and contact details.
sprint_goal: Enable Vendor Self-Service and Catalog Management
acceptance_criteria: Vendor can update store name, phone, address; Address change triggers re-geocoding; Address must be within an operational zone.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Geocoding integration verified.
collaboration_required: Frontend team, DevOps for Mapbox keys
deployment_notes: Requires external service integration.
business_value: Ensures data accuracy for logistics and customer experience.

title: Vendor Sets and Manages Daily Business Hours
description: As a vendor, I want to define and manage my store's daily operating hours, including multiple time slots per day or marking days as closed.
sprint_goal: Enable Vendor Self-Service and Catalog Management
acceptance_criteria: Vendor can set standard hours for a day; Vendor can mark a day as closed; Vendor can set multiple time slots per day; Customer view reflects store status correctly.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Timezone handling verified.
deployment_notes: Requires robust time-based logic on backend.
business_value: Automates store availability, preventing unfulfillable orders.

title: Vendor Toggles Store Availability
description: As a Vendor, I want a master switch to immediately toggle my store's availability between 'Online' and 'Offline' to manage unexpected events.
sprint_goal: Enable Vendor Self-Service and Catalog Management
acceptance_criteria: Vendor can take store offline and online; Customer view updates within 30 seconds to reflect status; 'Offline' switch overrides business hours.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Cache invalidation logic verified.
collaboration_required: Frontend team, other backend teams for event consumption
deployment_notes: Requires fast propagation of state changes across services.
business_value: Provides vendors with direct control over their operational status.

title: Vendor Manages Product Categories
description: As a Vendor, I want to create, view, edit, and delete product categories within my dashboard, so that I can effectively organize my product catalog.
sprint_goal: Enable Vendor Self-Service and Catalog Management
acceptance_criteria: Vendor can perform full CRUD on categories; Category names are unique per vendor; Cannot delete a category that contains products.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
business_value: Improves catalog organization for vendors and product discovery for customers.

title: Vendor Adds a New Product to Catalog
description: As a Vendor, I want to add a new product by providing its name, description, price, an image, and its current stock quantity.
sprint_goal: Enable Vendor Self-Service and Catalog Management
acceptance_criteria: Successful product creation with all required fields; Error on missing/invalid data; Invalid image upload is rejected; Product can be created with zero stock.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Secure file handling implemented.
deployment_notes: Requires S3 bucket for product images.
business_value: Enables vendors to populate their digital storefront, a fundamental requirement for sales.

title: Vendor Edits an Existing Product in their Catalog
description: As a vendor, I want to edit the details of an existing product, including its name, description, price, image, category, and stock quantity.
sprint_goal: Enable Vendor Self-Service and Catalog Management
acceptance_criteria: Successfully edit all product fields; Error on invalid data or empty required fields; Stock status is automatically updated on quantity change.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
business_value: Enables vendors to maintain an accurate and up-to-date product catalog.

title: Vendor Deletes a Product from Catalog
description: As a Vendor, I want to permanently remove a product from my catalog so that I can maintain an accurate and up-to-date list of items I offer for sale.
sprint_goal: Enable Vendor Self-Service and Catalog Management
acceptance_criteria: Successful soft-deletion of a product; Deletion is blocked for a product in an active order; Deleting a product preserves historical order data.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
deployment_notes: Requires cross-service call to Order service to check for active orders.
business_value: Ensures catalog accuracy, which improves the customer experience.

title: Customer Views Nearby Vendors Based on Current Location
description: As a customer, I want the app to automatically detect my location and show me a list of available vendors nearby.
sprint_goal: Enable Customer Product Discovery and Cart Management
acceptance_criteria: Customer grants location and sees a list of nearby, online vendors; Error is shown if location is denied; Empty state is shown if no vendors are available.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Geospatial query performance meets NFRs.
collaboration_required: Mobile team, DevOps for PostGIS setup
deployment_notes: Requires PostGIS extension on the database.
business_value: Primary discovery mechanism for customers, directly driving user engagement and orders.

title: Customer Searches for Stores or Items
description: As a customer, I want to use a powerful search bar to find specific stores or food items.
sprint_goal: Enable Customer Product Discovery and Cart Management
acceptance_criteria: Search for store by full name; Search for item by full name; Search using partial keyword; Search with a common typo returns correct results; Performance is <500ms.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Search API performance meets NFRs.
collaboration_required: Mobile team, DevOps for OpenSearch setup
deployment_notes: Requires a data indexing pipeline from PostgreSQL to OpenSearch.
business_value: Increases order conversion rate by reducing time to find desired products.

title: Customer Filters Search Results
description: As a customer, I want to apply filters for category, vendor rating, and price range to narrow down search results.
sprint_goal: Enable Customer Product Discovery and Cart Management
acceptance_criteria: Can apply single category filter; Can apply multiple combined filters; Can clear all filters; Filter state persists within a session.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; API performance meets NFRs.
deployment_notes: Extends the search API with filter parameters.
business_value: Improves product discovery and increases order conversion.

title: Customer Views Vendor Profile Page
description: As a customer, I want to view a detailed vendor profile page with their full product catalog, ratings, and business hours.
sprint_goal: Enable Customer Product Discovery and Cart Management
acceptance_criteria: Displays core vendor info, operational status, and categorized product catalog; Can search within vendor's catalog; Can navigate to detailed reviews.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; API performance meets NFRs.
deployment_notes: API needs to aggregate data from multiple sources.
business_value: Increases customer trust and conversion rates by providing all necessary information in a single view.

title: Customer Views Product Stock Status
description: As a customer, I want to see a clear stock status ('Available', 'Limited Stock', or 'Out of Stock') for each item.
sprint_goal: Enable Customer Product Discovery and Cart Management
acceptance_criteria: Displays 'Available' for ample stock; 'Limited Stock' for low stock; 'Out of Stock' for zero stock.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing.
business_value: Improves user experience by providing critical purchasing information upfront.

title: Customer Prevented from Adding Out of Stock Items to Cart
description: As a customer, I want to be visually informed and functionally prevented from adding an 'Out of Stock' item to my cart.
sprint_goal: Enable Customer Product Discovery and Cart Management
acceptance_criteria: 'Add to Cart' button is disabled for out-of-stock items; Backend rejects API call to add out-of-stock item.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing.
business_value: Reduces cart abandonment and improves customer satisfaction.

title: Customer Adds Item to Cart
description: As a customer, I want to add a specific item to my shopping cart with a single action.
sprint_goal: Enable Customer Product Discovery and Cart Management
acceptance_criteria: Add available item to empty cart; Increment quantity of item already in cart; Cannot add 'Out of Stock' item; Cannot add from closed store.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; API performance meets NFRs.
deployment_notes: Cart state likely managed in Redis for performance.
business_value: Enables the core purchasing workflow, a critical step in the sales funnel.

title: Customer Updates Item Quantity in Cart
description: As a Customer, I want to easily increase or decrease the quantity of any item in my cart.
sprint_goal: Enable Customer Product Discovery and Cart Management
acceptance_criteria: Successfully increase and decrease quantity; Cannot increase quantity beyond available stock; Decreasing quantity to zero triggers removal confirmation.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; UI/UX reviewed.
business_value: Improves user experience by providing essential control over order details.

title: Customer Removes Item from Cart
description: As a customer, I want to remove a specific item from my cart, so that I can finalize my order with only the items I intend to purchase.
sprint_goal: Enable Customer Product Discovery and Cart Management
acceptance_criteria: Remove an item from a multi-item cart; Remove the last item, resulting in an empty cart state; Handle network failure gracefully.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; API performance meets NFRs.
business_value: Improves user experience by providing essential control over order contents.

title: Customer Views Detailed Cart Summary Before Payment
description: As a customer, I want to see a detailed summary of my cart, including subtotal, taxes, delivery fees, and total, so that I can understand the full cost before payment.
sprint_goal: Enable Customer Product Discovery and Cart Management
acceptance_criteria: Displays all cost components (subtotal, taxes, delivery fee, total); Correct calculation of subtotal and total; Displays empty cart state correctly.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Calculation logic verified.
deployment_notes: Backend API needs to aggregate data from multiple sources (products, tax rules, delivery fee rules).
business_value: Increases customer trust and reduces cart abandonment by providing full cost transparency.

title: Customer Completes Online Payment
description: As a customer, I want to securely complete my payment using an online method like UPI or a card, so that my order is confirmed.
sprint_goal: Implement Core Transaction: Order Placement & Payment
acceptance_criteria: Successful payment with online method; Payment declined by gateway; User cancels on gateway page; Item becomes out of stock just before payment; Payment gateway callback is delayed or fails.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security review of payment integration complete; Reconciliation job implemented and tested.
collaboration_required: Mobile team, DevOps for Razorpay keys
deployment_notes: Critical, high-risk feature requiring careful deployment and monitoring.
business_value: Enables the core revenue-generating transaction of the platform.

title: Customer Receives In-App and External Order Confirmation
description: As a customer, I want to immediately see a confirmation screen in the app and receive a notification (SMS/Push), so that I know my order is being processed.
sprint_goal: Implement Core Transaction: Order Placement & Payment
acceptance_criteria: Successful confirmation for online and COD orders; In-app screen shows correct details; SMS/Push notifications contain correct details; System is resilient to UI or notification service failure.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Notification content reviewed.
deployment_notes: Relies on event-driven architecture.
business_value: Increases customer trust and reduces post-order anxiety.

title: Customer Cancels Order for Full Refund Within Grace Period
description: As a customer, I want to have a 60-second window to cancel my order for a full refund to correct any mistakes.
sprint_goal: Implement Core Transaction: Order Placement & Payment
acceptance_criteria: Successful cancellation within 60s; Full refund is initiated; Option disappears after 60s; Customer cancellation takes precedence over vendor acceptance.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Race condition handling verified.
deployment_notes: Requires careful handling of race conditions.
business_value: Improves customer satisfaction by providing a penalty-free way to correct mistakes.

title: Vendor Receives and Views New Incoming Orders on Dashboard
description: As a vendor, I want to be immediately notified of new incoming orders on my dashboard with a clear summary.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: New order appears on dashboard in real-time (<3s); Order card displays essential info and countdown timer; Customer cancellation removes the order in real-time.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Real-time performance verified.
deployment_notes: Requires a WebSocket server to be operational.
business_value: Enables the core order fulfillment process and improves customer satisfaction.

title: Vendor Accepts a New Order and Provides Preparation Time
description: As a Vendor, I want to accept an incoming order and provide an estimated preparation time.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Vendor accepts order and selects prep time; Order status updates to 'Preparing'; Customer is notified with updated ETA; Handles race conditions with cancellations.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Race condition handling verified.
deployment_notes: Core part of the order lifecycle.
business_value: Commits the vendor to the order and improves customer experience with an accurate ETA.

title: Vendor Selects Estimated Preparation Time After Accepting Order
description: As a Vendor, I want to select an estimated preparation time immediately after accepting an order, to provide the customer with a more accurate ETA.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: On accepting order, a modal appears with prep time options; Selection is mandatory to proceed; Options are sourced from admin configuration.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; UI/UX reviewed.
business_value: Improves customer satisfaction by setting accurate delivery expectations.

title: Vendor Rejects a New Order
description: As a Vendor, I want to reject a new incoming order with a single action, so that I can manage my operational capacity.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Vendor rejects prepaid order, a full refund is initiated; Vendor rejects COD order, no refund is initiated; Customer is notified.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Saga compensation logic for refund verified.
deployment_notes: Requires coordination across multiple microservices.
business_value: Enables vendors to control their order flow and improves customer satisfaction.

title: Vendor Marks Order as Ready for Pickup
description: As a Vendor, I want to mark an order as 'Ready for Pickup' on my dashboard so that the platform can start searching for a delivery rider.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Vendor marks order as 'Ready for Pickup'; Order status is updated; An 'OrderReadyForPickup' event is published to trigger rider allocation.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Event contract documented and verified.
deployment_notes: Critical trigger for the logistics phase.
business_value: Improves operational efficiency by initiating rider allocation at the precise moment of readiness.

title: Rider Sets Availability Status
description: As a Rider, I want a simple toggle to set my status to 'Online' or 'Offline' to control my availability.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Rider can go online and offline; Cannot go offline with an active delivery task; Status persists across app launches.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Race condition with task assignment handled.
business_value: Ensures the allocation system has an accurate, real-time pool of available riders.

title: Rider Receives New Task Offer with Decision-Critical Details
description: As an online Rider, I want to receive a clear and timely notification for a new delivery task offer with essential details.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Rider receives offer via push/websocket; Offer screen displays all required info (vendor, area, distance, earnings, timer); Offer expires when timer runs out.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Real-time performance verified.
deployment_notes: Relies on real-time messaging infrastructure.
business_value: Enables the core logistics loop by connecting available riders with ready orders.

title: Rider Views Task Details Before Acceptance
description: As a rider, I want to see a summary of the task, including map, locations, distance, time, and earnings, to decide whether to accept.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Offer screen shows map view, vendor/customer address, distance, time, earnings, and countdown timer; Offer auto-dismisses on timer expiration.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; UI/UX reviewed.
business_value: Empowers riders with transparent information, increasing satisfaction and efficiency.

title: Rider Accepts a Delivery Task
description: As a Rider, I want to tap a button to accept a new delivery task offer so that I am officially assigned the order.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Rider accepts valid task; Order is assigned to rider; Rider status becomes 'On Task'; Customer is notified; Handles race conditions where task is expired or taken.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Race condition and distributed transaction logic verified.
deployment_notes: Critical transaction requiring atomic operations.
business_value: A critical step in the order fulfillment lifecycle, enabling the core business function.

title: Rider Rejects a Delivery Task
description: As a Rider, I want to reject a new delivery task offer so that I can maintain control over my workload.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Rider rejects task; Offer screen is dismissed; Backend triggers re-assignment; Timeout is treated as implicit rejection.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing.
business_value: Improves rider autonomy and enables the logistics system to rapidly re-assign tasks.

title: Rider Uses In-App Navigation to Vendor
description: As a rider, I want to launch turn-by-turn navigation to the vendor's location with a single tap from my active task screen.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Tapping 'Navigate' launches default mapping app with vendor address pre-filled; Handles disabled location services; Handles missing map application.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Tested on physical iOS and Android devices.
business_value: Increases rider efficiency and accuracy by eliminating manual address entry.

title: Rider Updates Order Status to 'Arrived at Store'
description: As a rider, I want to tap a single button to confirm I have arrived at the vendor's location.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Rider taps 'Arrived at Store'; Order status is updated; Customer is notified; API is idempotent.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing.
business_value: Provides real-time order tracking for the customer and improves operational visibility.

title: Rider Updates Order Status to 'Picked Up' / 'In Transit'
description: As a Rider, I want to confirm that I have collected the order from the vendor with a single tap.
sprint_goal: Implement Logistics: Order Fulfillment and Pickup
acceptance_criteria: Rider confirms pickup; Order status updates to 'In Transit'; Customer is notified; Live tracking is activated for customer.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Downstream event consumption verified.
deployment_notes: Critical state transition that triggers multiple downstream processes.
business_value: Triggers the high-value live tracking feature and enhances customer trust.

title: Customer Views Real-Time Order Status
description: As a customer, I want to view a clear, real-time status of my order's progress, from confirmation to delivery.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Displays all key statuses in real-time ('Pending', 'Preparing', 'In Transit', 'Delivered'); UI updates automatically within 2 seconds of a status change.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Real-time update latency verified.
business_value: Increases customer trust and satisfaction by providing transparency.

title: Customer Tracks Rider Location on Map
description: As a customer, I want to see my assigned rider's real-time location moving on a map.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Map displays vendor, customer, and rider icons; Rider icon updates every 5-10 seconds; Tracking stops when order is delivered; Latency is under 2 seconds.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Performance requirements met.
deployment_notes: High-load feature requiring scalable WebSocket infrastructure.
business_value: Increases customer satisfaction and trust by providing transparency.

title: Customer Sees Rider's Last Known Location with Timestamp
description: As a customer, I want to see the rider's last known location on the map, along with a timestamp, when their GPS signal is temporarily lost.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Displays last known location when signal is lost for >30s; Restores live tracking when signal returns; Handles prolonged signal loss with a message.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing.
deployment_notes: Enhances the reliability of the tracking feature.
business_value: Improves user experience by managing expectations during technical glitches.

title: Customer Receives Real-Time Order Status Push Notifications
description: As a Customer, I want to receive real-time push notifications for critical order status changes.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Receives notifications for Accepted, Picked Up, Arrived, Delivered, Cancelled, and Allocation Failed statuses; Tapping notification deep-links to the order screen.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing on physical devices.
business_value: Improves customer experience by providing proactive, timely updates.

title: Rider Uses In-App Navigation to Customer
description: As a Rider, I want to launch an in-app, turn-by-turn navigation with voice guidance to the customer's address.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Launches full-screen navigation to customer address; Automatic re-routing on deviation; Handles GPS signal loss; Navigation audio continues in background.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Successful field test report approved.
deployment_notes: Requires integration of a native SDK.
business_value: Improves delivery efficiency and speed, enhances ETA accuracy, and increases rider safety.

title: Rider Updates Status to 'Arrived at Destination'
description: As a Rider, I want to tap a button to update the order status to 'Arrived at Destination' when I reach the customer's address.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Rider updates status; Customer is notified; UI transitions to Proof of Delivery screen; Geofencing check warns rider if far from destination.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Geofencing logic verified.
business_value: Provides crucial real-time updates to the customer and unlocks the final stage of the delivery workflow.

title: Rider Updates Status to 'Delivered' and Completes Task
description: As a Rider, I want to mark an order as 'Delivered' after completing the handover and providing the required Proof of Delivery.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Rider marks order as delivered after POD; Order status updates to 'Delivered'; 'OrderDelivered' event is published; Customer is notified; Post-delivery workflows are triggered.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Downstream event consumption verified.
deployment_notes: Critical state transition that triggers multiple downstream processes.
business_value: Marks the successful completion of the order lifecycle, triggering financial settlements and feedback loops.

title: Rider App: Graceful Handling of Denied GPS and Camera Permissions
description: As a Rider, I want to be clearly informed why GPS and camera permissions are essential and be guided on how to enable them if I deny them.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Rider is shown explanatory screen on GPS denial; Rider is shown explanatory screen on Camera denial; App provides a deep-link to device settings to enable permissions.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Manual E2E testing on physical devices for both iOS and Android complete.
deployment_notes: Requires significant manual testing on physical devices.
business_value: Improves rider experience by preventing a dead-end user flow.

title: Rider Views COD Amount to Collect
description: As a Rider, I want the app to clearly display the exact cash amount to be collected for a Cash on Delivery order.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Prominently displays 'Collect Cash: X.XX' for COD orders; Does not display for prepaid orders; Correct currency formatting.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing.
business_value: Ensures accurate collection of revenue for COD orders.

title: Rider Captures Photo as Proof of Delivery for Prepaid Orders
description: As a Rider, I want to capture and upload a photo of the delivered item at the customer's doorstep for prepaid orders.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Successful photo capture and upload; Handles camera permission denial; Queues upload on poor network; Rider can retake photo.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Secure file handling implemented.
deployment_notes: Requires robust offline handling.
business_value: Reduces financial loss from fraudulent 'item not received' claims.

title: Rider Enters OTP as Proof of Delivery
description: As a rider, I want to enter a 4-digit OTP provided by the customer into my app, so that I can securely confirm the handover of the order.
sprint_goal: Complete Delivery Logistics and Post-Order Experience
acceptance_criteria: Rider enters correct OTP, order is marked 'Delivered'; Rider enters incorrect OTP, an error is shown; Multiple incorrect attempts are handled.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security review of OTP validation endpoint complete.
deployment_notes: Requires coordination with customer app feature.
business_value: Reduces delivery disputes and fraud by creating a secure, verifiable Proof of Delivery.

title: Customer Chats with Vendor for an Active Order
description: As a Customer, I want to initiate a real-time chat with the vendor so that I can ask questions or provide clarifications.
sprint_goal: Enable Platform Communication and Advanced Order Management
acceptance_criteria: Customer can initiate and send messages for active orders; Chat becomes read-only for completed orders; Handles network loss.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements for channel authorization met.
deployment_notes: Requires WebSocket infrastructure.
business_value: Improves customer satisfaction and reduces order errors.

title: Customer Chats with Rider for Active Order
description: As a Customer, I want to initiate a real-time chat with my assigned Rider to coordinate a smooth handover.
sprint_goal: Enable Platform Communication and Advanced Order Management
acceptance_criteria: Chat option is available only after a rider is assigned; Customer sends/receives messages in real-time; Chat becomes read-only after completion.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
deployment_notes: Requires WebSocket infrastructure.
business_value: Improves first-attempt delivery success rates and customer satisfaction.

title: Customer Uses Quick-Reply in Chat
description: As a customer, I want to select from a list of predefined quick-reply messages to send common responses with a single tap.
sprint_goal: Enable Platform Communication and Advanced Order Management
acceptance_criteria: Customer views context-specific quick replies for Rider and Vendor chats; Tapping a button sends the message; Not available for completed orders.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing.
business_value: Improves user experience by making communication faster and more convenient.

title: Customer Cancels Order with a Fee After Rider Assignment
description: As a customer, I want to cancel my order even after a rider has been assigned, while being informed about a cancellation fee.
sprint_goal: Enable Platform Communication and Advanced Order Management
acceptance_criteria: Successful cancellation of prepaid order with partial refund; Cancellation of COD order adds fee as debt; System handles refund processing failure.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Distributed transaction logic verified.
deployment_notes: Requires complex, distributed transaction logic.
business_value: Provides a fair cancellation policy that balances customer flexibility with operational cost recovery.

title: Customer Prompted to Rate Order After Delivery
description: As a customer, I want to be prompted to rate my experience with the vendor and the rider after delivery.
sprint_goal: Enable Platform Communication and Advanced Order Management
acceptance_criteria: In-app prompt appears on app open after delivery; Push notification is triggered on delivery; Dismissing the prompt is possible.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing.
business_value: Increases the volume of ratings and reviews, building trust and providing crucial performance data.

title: Customer Rates Vendor and Products
description: As a customer, I want to provide a star rating and an optional text review for the vendor and their products.
sprint_goal: Enable Platform Communication and Advanced Order Management
acceptance_criteria: Customer can submit rating with/without review; Cannot submit without star rating; Cannot rate the same order twice; Input is sanitized.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; Security requirements met.
deployment_notes: Vendor's average rating should be updated asynchronously.
business_value: Generates user content that builds trust and provides a feedback loop for vendors.

title: Customer Rates Rider Performance After Delivery
description: As a customer, I want to provide a separate star rating and an optional text review for the delivery rider.
sprint_goal: Enable Platform Communication and Advanced Order Management
acceptance_criteria: Customer can submit rating with/without review for the rider; Star rating is mandatory; Cannot rate the same order's rider twice.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing.
business_value: Provides a key metric for rider performance and quality control.

title: Customer Views Order History
description: As a registered customer, I want to access a comprehensive history of all my past orders.
sprint_goal: Enable Platform Communication and Advanced Order Management
acceptance_criteria: Views a paginated list of past orders; Order summary shows key details; Can view full details of a specific order; Handles empty state and offline viewing.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing; API performance meets NFRs.
business_value: Increases customer retention and satisfaction by providing easy access to past order information.

title: System Processes Weekly Rider Settlements
description: As the System, I want to automatically run a weekly settlement process that calculates each rider's net earnings, reconciles COD collections, and initiates payouts.
sprint_goal: Implement Financial Settlements and Admin Reporting
acceptance_criteria: Rider with positive net earnings receives payout; Rider with negative balance is skipped; Handles payout API failures; Process is idempotent.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing against sandbox; Financial calculations manually verified.
deployment_notes: Financially critical feature requiring robust testing and monitoring.
business_value: Ensures timely and accurate rider payments, critical for rider retention and trust.

title: System Processes Weekly Vendor Payouts
description: As a Platform Administrator, I want the system to automatically calculate and process weekly payouts to eligible vendors.
sprint_goal: Implement Financial Settlements and Admin Reporting
acceptance_criteria: Successful payout for vendor with positive balance; Skips vendors with zero/negative balance; Handles API errors; Process is idempotent; Respects custom commission rates.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; E2E tests passing against sandbox; Financial calculations manually verified.
deployment_notes: Financially critical feature requiring robust testing and monitoring.
business_value: Automates a critical financial process, ensuring vendor satisfaction and trust.

title: System: Automate Deletion of Old Sensitive Operational Data
description: As a Platform Owner, I want the system to automatically and permanently delete sensitive operational data (POD photos, chat logs) for orders completed more than 90 days ago.
sprint_goal: Implement Compliance and System Automation Features
acceptance_criteria: Data for orders older than 90 days is deleted; Data for orders exactly 90 days old is not deleted; Job handles missing data gracefully; Job processes in batches.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; >80% test coverage; Job verified in staging environment; Logging and monitoring for the job are in place.
deployment_notes: Destructive data operation requires careful testing and a phased rollout.
business_value: Ensures compliance with data retention policies, reduces security risks, and optimizes storage costs.
